text.autoconfig.daycount.title: Day Count
text.autoconfig.daycount.option.dayCount: If enabled, the Day Count will be displayed | default: enabled
text.autoconfig.daycount.option.dayOffse: Offset value to add to Day Count
Minecraft starts on day 0, use this to start with a different value | default: 1
text.autoconfig.daycount.option.sizeX: Horizontal size of the Day Counter
text.autoconfig.daycount.option.sizeX.@T: Horizontal size (X-value) of the Day Counter | default: 2.0
text.autoconfig.daycount.option.sizeY: Vertical size of the Day Counter
text.autoconfig.daycount.option.sizeY.@T: Vertical size (Y-value) of the Day Counter | default: 2.0
text.autoconfig.daycount.option.location: Horizontal position of the Day Counter
Horizontal position (X-value) of the Day Counter | default: 2.0
Vertical position of the Day Counter
Vertical position (Y-value) of the Day Counter | default: 2.0
text.autoconfig.daycount.option.color.@T: Decimal color value of the Day Counter (see Minecraft color codes) | default: 16777215 (for white)
